title: Rick and Morty Wiki
description: Create a comprehensive website for the TV show 'Rick and Morty.' It will feature detailed character profiles, including current status (dead or alive) and last episode appearance. Users can easily navigate and search for characters. The website will also provide episode details, be mobile-friendly, and have an engaging design with images and videos.

title: TODO App
description: A React-based Todo app that enables users to create, update, and delete tasks. With features like task prioritization, due dates, and notifications, the app simplifies task management and helps users stay organized. Its responsive interface and efficient rendering provide a seamless user experience.

title: Tic Tac Toe
description: Tic Tac Toe app created using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Users can play the classic game on a web browser with a visually appealing interface. The app incorporates game logic to enable turn-taking, valid moves, and win detection. It offers an interactive and accessible gaming experience for players.
